title: Semantic Scholar | About Us
markdown:
# Semantic Scholar | About Us

-   [Overview](/about)
-   [Our Team](/about/team)
-   [Publishers](/about/publishers)
-   [Blog](https://medium.com/ai2-blog/semantic-scholar/home)
-   [AI2 Careers](https://allenai.org/careers?team=semantic+scholar#current-openings)

Semantic Scholar provides free, AI-driven search and discovery tools, and open resources for the global research community.

We index over 200 million academic papers sourced from [publisher partnerships](/about/publishers), data providers, and web crawls.

![Illustration: Papers being accelerated by Semantic Scholar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/60d37af64aa9cd061f711154_about_us_discovery_v3-01.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/6274192c8e3f6111c5eab05f_accelerating-science-01.svg)

### **Accelerating Scientific Breakthroughs Using AI**  

We are a Research and Product Development team within Ai2 building a better way to search and discover scientific knowledge.

Developed in-house, our state-of-the-art models process and classify papers in our pipeline. We distribute open code and datasets while publishing results of our research in the areas of Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Human Computer Interaction, and Information Retrieval.  

### **AI-Driven Tools for Scholars**  

Staying up-to-date with scientific literature is an increasingly pressing challenge for scholars.  

With Semantic Scholar, researchers can understand a paper at a glance. Our system extracts meaning and identifies connections from within papers, then surfaces these insights to help Scholars discover and understand research.

[Learn More](/product)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/62718c998b96968f71e7a0bf_Concept%20Illustrations_mar2021-01.svg)

### Our Values  

Our Values reflect who we are, why we are building Semantic Scholar, and guide us through hard decisions.

#### Apply AI Creatively

We are motivated to use AI in novel ways for a dramatic impact. Tackling our problems with AI not only helps our community, it also improves the quality of our AI research by grounding it in real-world application.

#### Promote Equal Access to Science

Scientific knowledge should be available to everyone. We recognize that the status quo disproportionately benefits certain groups of scholars over others. As a non-profit, we evaluate the impact of our choices and pursue directions that help balance the scales.

#### Be Collaborative

Collaboration makes us stronger. We make a conscious effort to collaborate with our teammates, and by doing so, we will both improve the quality of our work and distribute the burden of support.

#### Take Bold Measures

We are small, but mighty. We stand behind our convictions when we believe they are the right direction, even if that is a more difficult path. We question what has been done historically, never satisfied with the status quo.

#### Learn Early

We aim to gain knowledge sooner by starting conversations early and by prototyping our ideas quickly. When we realize a path we have chosen is not working, we are willing to recognize it openly and do the work to learn from it.

#### Be Trustworthy and Transparent

We aim to establish a higher standard for applying AI in a trustworthy and transparent way. By educating and building trust in our AI-driven solutions, we will foster a community who are invested in our success and patient with our mistakes.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/62718f3ac217494953fdff98_resources-API-illo-01.svg)

### **Resources for the Global Research Community**  

We provide a free, reliable source of scholarly data for developers to build projects that accelerate scientific progress.

The Semantic Scholar Academic Graph (S2AG) [Dataset](https://api.semanticscholar.org/corpus) and [APIs](https://www.semanticscholar.org/product/api) provide records for research papers published in all fields provided as an easy-to-use JSON archive. The Semantic Scholar Open Research Corpus ([S2ORC](https://github.com/allenai/s2orc)) is a general purpose corpus for NLP and text mining research over scientific papers built and maintained by Semantic Scholarâ€™s research team. Papers are aggregated into a unified source to create the largest publicly-available collection of machine-readable academic text, provided as a JSON archive.  

### AI For The Common Good  

At Ai2, our mission is building breakthrough AI to solve the world's biggest problems.  

Semantic Scholar was launched in 2015 as a groundbreaking project at Ai2, a non-profit research institute founded in 2014 with the mission of conducting high-impact AI research and engineering in service of the common good. Ai2 is the creation of Paul Allen, Microsoft co-founder.

	/* Auth */
	.site-header__navigation-auth {
		display: var(--has-auth--block) !important;
  	}
	.site-header__navigation-not-auth {
		display: var(--no-auth--none) !important;
  	}
  
	/* Dropdown Menu Top Bar */
	.dropdown .dropdown__menu:before{
    	border-color: transparent transparent #1857B6 transparent;
		border-style: solid;
		border-width: 0 8px 8px 8px;
		content:"";
		height: 0;
		position: absolute;
		right: 12px;
		top: -12px;
		width: 0;
	}
  
	/* Embedded Newsletter Hubspot Form */
	.newsletter .hbspt-form label{
		margin: 0;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form {
		align-items: end;
		display: flex;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form-field {
		flex: 1;
		position: relative;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form-field .hs-input {
		border: 1px solid #546973;	
		font-size: 16px;
		height: 36px;
		line-height: 36px;
		padding: 8px;
		width: 100%;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form-field .hs-input.error {
		border-color: #a92020;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form-field .hs-error-msgs {
		background: #a92020;
		bottom: -44px;
		left: 4px;
		list-style: none;
		margin: 0;
		padding: 6px 12px;
		position: absolute;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form-field .hs-error-msgs:after {
		border-color: transparent transparent transparent #a92020;	
		border-style: solid;
		border-width: 8px 0 0 8px;
		content: "";
		height: 0;
		left: 0;
		position: absolute;
		top: -8px;
		width: 0;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-form-field .hs-error-msg {
		color: #fff;
		font-size: 14px;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-submit {
		flex: 0 0 auto;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-submit .hs-button {
		background: #1857B6;
		border: none;
		border-radius: 0 3px 3px 0;
		color: #fff;
		cursor: pointer;
		font-size: 14px;
		height: 36px;
		line-height: 36px;
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0 14px;
		transition: background-color 250ms cubic-bezier(.25, .46, .45, .94);
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs-submit .hs-button:hover {
		background: #0f3875;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .hs_error_rollup {
		display: none;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .submitted-message{
		border: 1px solid #1857B6;
		border-radius: 3px;
		padding: 12px;
	}
	.newsletter .hbspt-form .submitted-message p {
		color: #fff;
		margin: 0;
		text-align: left !important;
	}
	.newsletter-embed--accessibility .hbspt-form label{
    	color: #fff;
      	font-family: "Roboto Slab", Serif;
		font-size: 18px;
      	font-weight: 400;
	    text-align: center;
      	padding-bottom: 12px;
  	}
  
  	/* Paper Object */
	.paper{
		filter: drop-shadow(0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.1));
	}
	.paper:after{
		background: #D9DADB;
		clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%);
		content: " ";
		height: 24px;
		position: absolute;
		right: 0;
		top: 0;
		width: 24px;
	}
	.paper__content{
		clip-path: polygon(0 0, calc(100% - 24px) 0%, 100% calc(0% + 24px), 100% 100%, 0% 100%);
	}
  
  
  	/* Testimonials */
  	.testimonial__citation:after{
		content: "";
		position: absolute;
	    top: 36px;
		width: 0;
		height: 0;
		border-style: solid;
		border-width: 8px 0 8px 8px;
		border-color: transparent transparent transparent #f5f6f7;
		left: -24px;
  	}
  
  	.testimonial__citation.testimonial__citation--alt:after{
		left: auto;
    	right: -24px;
	    border-width: 8px 8px 8px 0;
    	border-color: transparent #f5f6f7 transparent transparent; 
	}
  
  	@media screen and (max-width: 767px){
		.testimonial__citation:after{
			display: none;
      	}
  }

class="blade__content"><h1>About Semantic Scholar</h1><p class="p__intro p__intro--header">Helping Scholars Discover New Insights</p><p class="p__intro">Semantic Scholar provides free, AI-driven search and discovery tools, and open resources for the global research community. </p><p>We index over 200 million academic papers sourced from <a href="/about/publishers">publisher partnerships</a>, data providers, and web crawls.</p></div><div class="blade__content"><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/60d37af64aa9cd061f711154_about_us_discovery_v3-01.png" loading="lazy" srcset="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/60d37af64aa9cd061f711154_about_us_discovery_v3-01-p-500.png 500w, https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/60d37af64aa9cd061f711154_about_us_discovery_v3-01.png 800w" sizes="(max-width: 479px) 57vw, (max-width: 767px) 47vw, (max-width: 991px) 46vw, 30vw" alt="Illustration: Papers being accelerated by Semantic Scholar" class="blade__illustration"></div></div></div><div id="mission" class="blade"><div class="blade__grid blade__grid--3-4"><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/6274192c8e3f6111c5eab05f_accelerating-science-01.svg" loading="lazy" alt="" class="blade__illustration"><div id="w-node-ebd49be8-c582-20ea-d949-557cc42afe7c-287a88a0" class="blade__content"><h2 id="w-node-b66281cf-7042-169e-dccc-19b4be366f0d-287a88a0" class="section__header">Our Mission</h2><h3 class="margin-top--none"><strong>Accelerating Scientific Breakthroughs Using AI </strong><br></h3><p class="p__intro">We are a Research and Product Development team within Ai2 building a better way to search and discover scientific knowledge.</p><div class="w-richtext"><p>Developed in-house, our state-of-the-art models process and classify papers in our pipeline. We distribute open code and datasets while publishing results of our research in the areas of Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Human Computer Interaction, and Information Retrieval.<br></p></div></div></div></div><div class="blade blade--white"><div class="blade__grid blade__grid--2-1"><div id="w-node-fe3709fc-954a-75b6-b27b-fcf845fcb7c3-287a88a0" class="blade__content"><h3><strong>AI-Driven Tools for Scholars</strong><br></h3><p class="p__intro">Staying up-to-date with scientific literature is an increasingly pressing challenge for scholars.<br></p><p> With Semantic Scholar, researchers can understand a paper at a glance. Our system extracts meaning and identifies connections from within papers, then surfaces these insights to help Scholars discover and understand research.</p><a href="/product" class="button button--secondary w-button">Learn More</a></div><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/62718c998b96968f71e7a0bf_Concept%20Illustrations_mar2021-01.svg" loading="lazy" alt="" class="blade__illustration"></div></div><div id="values" class="blade blade--collapsed"><div class="blade__grid blade__grid--full"><h3 class="content-centered margin-top--none">Our Values<br></h3><p class="p__intro content-centered">Our Values reflect who we are, why we are building Semantic Scholar, and guide us through hard decisions.</p><div class="grid--values"><div data-w-id="609ec677-037f-1112-2382-c399a03a7302" class="well value" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 100px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; opacity: 0;"><h4 class="values__title">Apply AI Creatively</h4><p class="values__description">We are motivated to use AI in novel ways for a dramatic impact. Tackling our problems with AI not only helps our community, it also improves the quality of our AI research by grounding it in real-world application.</p></div><div data-w-id="e1ce5059-790c-fae6-3479-5c45e89653ec" class="well value" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 100px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; opacity: 0;"><h4 class="values__title">Promote Equal Access to Science</h4><p class="values__description">Scientific knowledge should be available to everyone. We recognize that the status quo disproportionately benefits certain groups of scholars over others. As a non-profit, we evaluate the impact of our choices and pursue directions that help balance the scales.</p></div><div data-w-id="3d1f6a66-7ef2-f1ef-8dae-da8955b0129b" class="well value" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 100px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; opacity: 0;"><h4 class="values__title">Be Collaborative</h4><p class="values__description">Collaboration makes us stronger. We make a conscious effort to collaborate with our teammates, and by doing so, we will both improve the quality of our work and distribute the burden of support.</p></div><div data-w-id="002e2e43-9dff-d99d-d580-e893e7ce7d91" class="well value" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 100px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; opacity: 0;"><h4 class="values__title">Take Bold Measures</h4><p class="values__description">We are small, but mighty. We stand behind our convictions when we believe they are the right direction, even if that is a more difficult path. We question what has been done historically, never satisfied with the status quo.</p></div><div data-w-id="83db287d-f7f0-c485-e897-3c12f4b308d3" class="well value" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 100px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; opacity: 0;"><h4 class="values__title">Learn Early</h4><p class="values__description">We aim to gain knowledge sooner by starting conversations early and by prototyping our ideas quickly. When we realize a path we have chosen is not working, we are willing to recognize it openly and do the work to learn from it.</p></div><div data-w-id="ccc911f0-1acf-59f1-cce5-f10d948f0789" class="well value" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 100px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; opacity: 0;"><h4 class="values__title">Be Trustworthy and Transparent</h4><p class="values__description">We aim to establish a higher standard for applying AI in a trustworthy and transparent way. By educating and building trust in our AI-driven solutions, we will foster a community who are invested in our success and patient with our mistakes.</p></div></div></div></div><div id="resources" class="blade blade--white"><div class="blade__grid blade__grid--1-2"><div class="blade__content"><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/62718f3ac217494953fdff98_resources-API-illo-01.svg" loading="lazy" alt="" class="blade__illustration"></div><div id="w-node-e0511705-57c9-3f6d-e938-64d454c81eca-287a88a0" class="blade__content"><h3 class="margin-top--none"><strong>Resources for the Global Research Community</strong><br></h3><p class="p__intro">We provide a free, reliable source of scholarly data for developers to build projects that accelerate scientific progress.</p><div class="w-richtext"><p> The Semantic Scholar Academic Graph (S2AG) <a href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/corpus">Dataset</a> and <a href="https://www.semanticscholar.org/product/api">APIs</a> provide records for research papers published in all fields provided as an easy-to-use JSON archive. The Semantic Scholar Open Research Corpus (<a href="https://github.com/allenai/s2orc">S2ORC</a>) is a general purpose corpus for NLP and text mining research over scientific papers built and maintained by Semantic Scholarâ€™s research team. Papers are aggregated into a unified source to create the largest publicly-available collection of machine-readable academic text, provided as a JSON archive.<br></p></div></div></div></div><div class="blade blade--dark"><div class="blade__grid"><div class="blade__content"><h3 class="text--on-dark">AI For The Common Good<br></h3><p class="p__intro">At Ai2, our mission is building breakthrough AI to solve the world's biggest problems.<br></p><div class="w-richtext"><p>Semantic Scholar was launched in 2015 as a groundbreaking project at Ai2, a non-profit research institute founded in 2014 with the mission of conducting high-impact AI research and engineering in service of the common good. src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605236bb767e9a5bb229c63c/js/semanticscholar.15d8b03cf.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script>
    $(document).ready(function() { 

        // Contact Form
        $('.contact-modal__form').submit(function(e){

            // Stops regular form submit
            e.preventDefault();

            // Sets variables, encodes form into json
            var $this = $(this),
                $parent = $this.parent(),
                $success = $parent.find(".contact-modal__form-success"),
                $error = $parent.find(".contact-modal__form-error"),
                action = $this.attr('action'),
                submission = $this.serializeArray().reduce((memo, field) => ({...memo, [field.name]: field.value}), {});

            // Record URL
            submission.url=window.location.href;

            // Submit
            $.ajax(action, {
                method: 'POST',
                contentType: 'application/json',
                data: JSON.stringify(submission),
                cache: false,
                dataType: 'json',
                crossDomain: true,
                processData: false
            }).always(function(e){

                // Hides form, shows success
                $this.hide();
                $success.show();

            });

            // just in case
            return false;
        });


        // Listens for links to /about/contact and pops up contact form instead of redirecting.
        $('.main a[href$="about/contact"]').on('click', function(e){
            
            e.preventDefault();
            $('.contact-modal').show();

        });

    });
</script></body></html>
